name: cp-book-tracker
description: Single-page application (SPA) that helps users track their progress while studying the Competitive Programming book authored by Felix Halim.

scripts.zip-packages: rm -f packages/*.zip && for dir in packages/*; do (cd "$dir" && zip -r "../$(basename "$dir").zip" . && cd ../.. && rm -rd "$dir"); done
scripts.package:win: npm run build && cross-var electron-packager dist/$npm_package_name/browser $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version --out=packages --platform=win32 --arch=all --overwrite && npm run zip-packages
scripts.package:linux: npm run build && cross-var electron-packager dist/$npm_package_name/browser $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version --out=packages --platform=linux --arch=x64 --arch=arm64 --overwrite && npm run zip-packages
scripts.package:osx: npm run build && cross-var electron-packager dist/$npm_package_name/browser $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version --out=packages --platform=darwin --arch=all --overwrite && npm run zip-packages
scripts.package:all: npm run build && cross-var electron-packager dist/$npm_package_name/browser $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version --out=packages --platform=all --arch=x64 --arch=arm64 --overwrite && npm run zip-packages
